item.description:
January 29 / Barcelona West Hartford / 7:00 pm
Barcelona ‘Uncorked’
$45 per person

Please make your reservation and payment arrangem,ents with Barcelona

This is our first annual “Uncorked” wine tasting, where we will open more than 30 of our much-loved selections – including all the new wines we discovered in our latest travels to Argentina, Uruguay and Spain that are recently imported especially for BarcelonaWith over 250 wines on our list now, many from obscure regions of Spain and South America, we have been wanting to entice our wine-loving customers with a chance to try many of our unknown, hidden gems. This walk-around tasting will include wine-friendly passed tapas by our new West Hartford Chef, Adam Greenberg. Don’t miss out on finding your new favorite wine!
item.how_to_find_us: I will be there with a glass of wine in my hand

group.name: The West Hartford Over 40 Fun Bunch!

item.name: UNCORKED BARCELONA
